section.name: Articles and Presentations
section.p: This page lists articles and presentations written about Ant. If you've written something that should be included, please post it to one of the mailing lists.

subsection.name: Ant in Anger: Using Ant in a Production Development System
subsection.p: This document describes strategies and some basic examples of how to use Ant in larger team development projects.

subsection.name: Ant Task Guidelines
subsection.p: This document describes how to write custom Ant tasks, and how to submit them to potentially be included in Ant.

subsection.name: Incremental development with Ant and JUnit
subsection.p: This article explores the benefits of unit testing with Ant and JUnit, detailing how to develop automated unit tests and integrate them into your build process.

subsection.name: Automate your build process using Java and Ant
subsection.p: This article provides an introduction to using Ant with some basic examples and by highlighting some of the important tasks.

subsection.name: Short tutorial in Cactus' (formerly J2EEUnit) documentation
subsection.p: There is a short tutorial on how to use Ant in Cactus' documentation. It has a slant towards build files that will be used with Cactus.

subsection.name: Developing custom Ant tasks with VisualAge for Java
subsection.p: This article outlines how to integrate Ant into VisualAge for Java, and how to write and debug custom tasks using the IDE and the integrated debugger.

subsection.name: Automated builds with VisualAge for Java and Ant
subsection.p: This article shows how you can perform command line builds with a VisualAge for Java repository.

subsection.name: Ant: A Build Tool from the Jakarta Project
subsection.p: This article is from the "Best Practices" section of Sun's Dot-Com Builder Site.

subsection.name: Making a Mountain Out of an Anthill
subsection.p: This article is from the June 2001 issue of the Java Developer' Journal. You need to be a registered JDJ subscriber to view this article.

subsection.name: Using Ant and Weblogic EJBs
subsection.p: This article describes how to use Ant to create Weblogic EJBs, and some workarounds for issues you may encounter.

subsection.name: An Introduction to Ant
subsection.p: This article is a short introduction into the basic concepts of Ant.

subsection.name: Ant Build Tool
subsection.p: A PowerPoint presentation on Ant 1.2. It provides a basic overview of Ant's capabilities.

subsection.name: Ant
subsection.p: A detailed Ant 1.3 PowerPoint presentation, made at the St. Louis Java Users Group meeting in March 2001. Includes a detailed build file and basic descriptions of all the built in and optional tasks.

subsection.name: Modern Development Crises
subsection.p: This presentation is an overview of the current state of software development today. There are a couple of slides that briefly cover Ant.
